content:
TERM: Vetting Agent Cognitive Capability

DEFINITION:
Cognitive capability corresponding to Vetting Agent. Provides the higher-order cognitive support for the operational Vetting Agent system, ensuring symmetrical architecture between cognitive and operational levels.

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
Created to maintain symmetrical architecture with Vetting Agent system.

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
Providing cognitive guidance for Vetting Agent operational processes.

CATEGORY: CognitiveCapability

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: CognitiveCorrespondence; confidence: 0.85; corresponds_to: VettingagenT; level: Above; enables: CognitiveSupport, HigherOrderProcessing, StrategicGuidance, SymmetricalArchitecture
